testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enters invalid email & password...................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: user can click on the product in the home slider
testcase.name: when user clicks on product in first slider, product page is opened

failure.message: nokia page isn't opened after clicking on 1st slider expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given user opens homepage and clicks on product in first slider.............passed Then the page of the product will open ( NOKIA).............................failed
